sentences.en: Celia knew that and that the combination was a happy blend of business crispness and femininity.
sentences.cn: 西莉亚知道,这样打扮,把生意人的干脆利落和女性的特点完满地结合在一起了,很中看.

sentences.en: Dara challenges our stereotypical ideas about gender and femininity.
sentences.cn: 达拉对我们老一套的性别和女性特质观念提出了异议。

sentences.en: Featuring essence of Moroccan rose oil, this is an exquisite fresh fragrance that simply exudes femininity.
sentences.cn: 特有摩洛哥玫瑰精华油, 既高贵又能突显女性魅力.

sentences.en: God includes masculinity and femininity within himself without having sexual gender.
sentences.cn: 神无性别,但含有男性与女性特质.

sentences.en: Inspired from the movie Chocolat, this bra embodies the power of love and femininity.
sentences.cn: 灵感来自电影[巧克力], 这胸罩,体现了爱的力量和女性气质.

sentences.en: Long hair was traditionally regarded as a sign of femininity.
sentences.cn: 长头发在传统上被认为是娇滴滴的象徵.

sentences.en: Pretty in pink - these earring in Rosaline crystal make a statement of elegance and femininity.
sentences.cn: 粉色的柔美 ─ ─这对玫红色水晶耳环显示出您的高雅和妩媚.

sentences.en: She kept her femininity even in greasy overalls.
sentences.cn: 即使穿著油腻的工作服,她仍保持著娇滴滴.

sentences.en: Such a traditional concept of femininity also suited the political agenda.
sentences.cn: 这种传统观念的女性,也适合政治议程.

sentences.en: The right perfume or beer resolves doubts about femininity or masculinity.
sentences.cn: 恰当的香水或啤酒使人对女性气质或男性气概不再生疑.

sentences.en: This stunning pendant exudes femininity and sensuality.
sentences.cn: 这个惊人的吊坠散发着女性的性感.

sentences.en: You don’t have to lose your femininity to be an independent, successful woman.
sentences.cn: 成为独立成功的女性并非就会失去女人味。

words.tran_cn: 女性的；雌性的；柔弱的，柔和的
女性的；妇女（似）的；阴性的；娇柔的

trans.tran_cn: 女性气质，娇弱，温柔，妇女的总称
trans.tran_en: qualities that are considered to be typical of women, especially qualities that are gentle, delicate, and pretty
